title: New client wont let me reconnect
body: It froze up on me and I had to restart it and now it wont let me reconnect to the game.

replies.body:
When you say froze up on you, do you mean the client or while in-game?  What happens if you log onto the legacy client?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know so I can get a better understanding of what's going on.  I'll be here!

Like, I started up a game and it took like a minute and a half to get into the loading screen then it froze up. I tried logging off and force shutting everything and when I reopened it wouldnt let me connect back into the game nor did it relaunch the game. It took 5 attempts of force quitting and relogging until it finally came up and when I loaded in it was already too late.

It sounds like you might have an unstable connection trying to reach the game servers, since you were able to finally make it in.  Your best bet in your case would be to go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Hopefully the steps should fix it up, but let me know!
